title: Illaoi tentacles count as farm??
body:
Why do illaoi tentacles count as farm?? I mean they give 5 gold. It gives a false impression on farm since you'll end with 400+ cs but will have no where near that amount of gold. 

It should count as a cs only when you kill 3 or 4

replies.body:
{{champion:74}} turrets count as farm
{{champion:143}} plants count as farm
{{champion:41}} barrels count as farm
{{champion:1}} Tibbers counts as farm
{{champion:60}} spiderlings count as farm
{{champion:202}} traps count as farm
{{champion:7}} clone counts as farm
{{champion:62}} clone counts as farm

{{champion:35}} jack in the boxes count as farm

{{champion:83}} ghosts count as farm
{{item:2043}} counts as farm
{{item:3363}} counts as farm
{{item:3340}} counts as farm


Why should Illaoi's be different again?

> Why should Illaoi's be different again?

Why should any of them be farm other than Tibbers?
Why should Tibbers be the exception?

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=j5F7kucX,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-07-13T16:10:36.057+0000)
>
> Why should Tibbers be the exception?

Tibbers gives 50g.

Caster minion gives 17.5 gold to start out with. 

{{champion:35}} Ult gives 25 gold, {{champion:7}} Clone gives 25 gold, {{champion:62}} Clone gives 25 gold. {{item:3340}} gives 30 gold.

Cannon minion gives 45.5 gold to start out with.

Saying that none of the options that give more gold than the average minion shouldn't count seems a little unintuitive.
not to mention illaoi vessels give 25g but I never paid attention to if it counted towards cs. I would imagine it does too.
Because Tibbers has a ridiculous amount of health compared to all the others? (Save for Wukong Clone who mimics his health)

{{champion:35}} clone also mimics his health, and mimics item effects (like Duskblade).

CS has always been a fickle stat:

* Caster Minion = 1 CS = 17.5 gold
* Cannon Minion = 1 CS = 45.5 gold
* Blue/Red Buff = 1 CS = 58 gold
* Rift Scuttler = 1 CS = 70 gold
* Baron = 1 CS = 300 gold per person on your team

You use it as a *relative* comparison between you and your opponent. Items, Runes, Masteries, Abilities, and global objectives mean it's *never* told the complete story, and likely never will.
Isn't he also worth like 50g?

> [{quoted}](name=Blumpkin Nation,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=j5F7kucX,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-13T16:13:58.922+0000)
>
> Because Tibbers has a ridiculous amount of health compared to all the others? (Save for Wukong Clone who mimics his health)

minions take abouts the same amount of hits as a ward
Barrels don't count as cs, neither does malz' voidlings.
Pretty sure champion kills actually count, too.
They don't, only champ clones.
Confirmed in a custom; my bad.

Thing is how many shrooms or clones do you kill in a game like 3-4 clones, 10 shrooms MAYBE 20 if we re generous? lets say your farm is 250 and you have 20 shrooms thats a boost to 270 only which doesn't really affect it that much % wise.

On the other hand, I've probably killed over 100+ tentacles which brings my farm from 300 to 400+ which is WAY off and ridiculous. thats a 33% increase.

How many Zyra plants do you kill per game? 

CS is always a relative score, taken with a grain of salt. Two players with the exact same CS may have earned drastically different amounts of gold, depending on their Runes, Masteries, Items, Abilities, and what they killed. 

There's a reason the stat isn't "total gold earned", it's intended for it to be a nebulous indicator of how much gold someone has.

You're right and I'm not saying all heim and zyra and everything shouldnt be a cs but illaoi tentacles happen so often it boosts the cs count by a ridiculous amount.

I'm getting destroyed in lane by one like I can barely farm but for some reason my cs is higher then hers..
Malzahars voidlings don't count as farm man.
{{champion:75}} 's favorite matchup
zzrot also counts as farm i guess and it doesnt give that much money so yea

most stuff do I think. Pretty sure wards and all champion summoned stuff do

>

and that is barely ever relative to all the other farm in the game or even all games ever played 

they take forever to destroy, they should totally be worth gold

>

> 
> they take forever to destroy, they should totally be worth gold

They are worth gold. That's what I'm pointing out.
however GP qs insta kill voidlings when you have triforce and gives you that sweet q gold. you also get gold from them if you have cull. pretty neat
Don't forget {{champion:41}} {{champion:45}} and {{champion:4}} get bonuses for minions kills too.

> [{quoted}](name=dunkeroni,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=j5F7kucX,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-07-13T16:51:34.615+0000)
>
> Don't forget {{champion:41}} {{champion:45}} and {{champion:4}} get bonuses for minions kills too.

veigar wouldnt. he cant target the tentacles with spells, can he? gp the same.

but tf should get extra gold.

I think GP can target them with Q, but I may be wrong. In any case, these 6 champions are reasons to why so many things do count as cs,  even if they're not lane minions. They can get bonuses from yorick ghouls, zyra plants, heimer turrets etc.

gp cant target illaoi tentacles with q. the tentacles can only be damages by auto attacks. not abilities that mimc auto attacks

except for azir soldiers. azir soldier cant attack tentacles from range as well as wards barrels and anything else that can be attack with normal AA
I'm assuming he can target actual pets (plants, ghouls, turrets etc.) but not tentacles or enemy barrels.
Well if you don't like that then I've got some bad news for you about the {{item:3512}} voidspawns...

Yorick Heimer Teemo Shaco and Zyra all supply a "fake" farm count when you lane against them and kill their "pet"s 
it sucks when i play mid zyra and the enemy midlaner is like 20 cs above me and its entirely because of them killing my plants and i feel im furthur behind ;;.
Pretty much every minion does. {{champion:83}} {{champion:74}} minions and even wards count.
Assuming that gold = number of CS is dumb anyways. For example, jungle mobs are worth quite a bit more in terms of gold than a lane caster is.

welcome to the jungle issue.
As soon as the gold per cs differs alot, cs is no longer a really relevant number.
A nunu for example will usuall have much less cs than the oposing jungler, but more gold as he just eats away their big monsters and they get the small ones.

However, if you don't want a complex statistic that shows how often you killed each typ of minion/monster you killed nor the direct info on how much gold one has, then the cs number is probably the best call to get a rough impresion on how you stand compared to the rest.
{{champion:75}} +3
